heading: Website design and development of a custom Wordpress site for a Bristol based coach, facilitator and organisational psychologist.
objective: To create a professional and engaging website that showcases the project's services and expertise.
process: The project provided a detailed brief and content for the site. I designed and developed the site using Wordpress and Oxygen Builder. The site was optimised for SEO and performance.
result: The project was very happy with the site and has received positive feedback from projects and colleagues.
